00035 //proxy comm mode command related
00036 #ifndef TUNNELING_SMALL_BUFFER_COUNT
00037 #define TUNNELING_SMALL_BUFFER_COUNT        2
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #ifndef TUNNELING_LARGE_BUFFER_COUNT
00041 #define TUNNELING_LARGE_BUFFER_COUNT        1
00042 #endif
00043 #define TOTAL_NO_OF_TUNNELING_ENTRIES      (TUNNELING_SMALL_BUFFER_COUNT + TUNNELING_LARGE_BUFFER_COUNT)
00044 #define TUNNELING_BUFFER_MAX_SIZE           90u
00045 #ifndef TUNNELING_SMALL_BUFFER_SIZE
00046 // The following can be changed based on the use case
00047 #define TUNNELING_SMALL_BUFFER_SIZE        (TUNNELING_BUFFER_MAX_SIZE / 2)
00048 #endif
00049 // The following is required as per test spec.
00050 #define TUNNELING_LARGE_BUFFER_SIZE         TUNNELING_BUFFER_MAX_SIZE
00051 #define TOTAL_TUNNELING_BUFFER_SIZE         (TUNNELING_SMALL_BUFFER_COUNT * TUNNELING_SMALL_BUFFER_SIZE + \
00052                                              TUNNELING_LARGE_BUFFER_COUNT * TUNNELING_LARGE_BUFFER_SIZE)
